title: Arrow Pointing Rightwards Then Curving Upwards

verbs: To encounter, discover; to come upon.
To come near to in place, time, character or value; to draw nearer to.
To come near to; to approach.
To come near to; to move towards.
To come closer to; to approach.
nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).
The management or direction of the affairs of a public or private office, business or organization.
Government, control, superintendence, physical or manual handling or guidance; act of managing by direction or regulation, or administration, as management of family, or of household, etc.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's right-hand arrow curving upwards is a dynamic and polished symbol, rendered with a vibrant blue color and a sleek, glossy finish that exemplifies Apple's 3D design language. The smooth gradient and crisp edges on Apple devices give it a sense of upward momentum and progression, making it ideal for indicating growth, improvement, or moving forward in a positive direction.
